Text:
Such a shame when someone goes to a lot of trouble to make material available, but then leaves the torrent incomplete.  
Lots of people trying to download these collections and then finding they are only 70%, 80%, 99% 
:-(
But, a big thank you to rocketronniederman for the sheer effort this must have taken, some real gems in the material I have been able to download.

Totally unaware that anything was wrong and I am addressing the problem as we speak ! I've reseeded some of the offending uploads, but I am at a loss as to why they are showing only 98.23% when others, uploaded in exactly the same way are showing 100%. Any help would be useful and appreciated.
I've found out what was wrong, the torrent files weren't write protected and were altered when played, thus causing hash failures, or so I've been told !!!!
Might as well just download my torrents as 90% are on  them
